column1: #Text=Southern Raiders commander says : " Who are you ? "
#Text=Zuko says : " You do n't remember her ?
#Text=Think back to your last raid on the Southern Water Tribe .
#Text=" Southern Raiders commander says : " I do n't know what you 're talking about .
#Text=You look her in the eye and you tell me you do n't remember what you did .
#Text=He 's the leader of the Southern Raiders !
#Text=" Zuko says : " If you 're not the man we 're looking for , who is ?
#Text=" Southern Raiders commander says : " You must be looking for Yon Rha .
